pages.title: Why Shivalik College
pages.intro: NAAC A+ recognition, deep industry partnerships, and a legacy of interdisciplinary education make Shivalik College the flagship destination for ambitious learners in Uttarakhand.

tabs.label: Overview
tabs.heading: Let Us Introduce Ourselves
tabs.description: Since 2008, Shivalik College has united faculty, students, alumni, and researchers who collaborate in a shared spirit of innovation, service, and societal progress.

cards.title: Legacy & Recognition
cards.body: Founded under the Rijan Educational Society, Shivalik became Uttarakhand's first autonomous private college approved by the UGC and continues to be ranked among India's leading engineering institutions.

cards.title: Academic Ecosystem
cards.body: The ecosystem now spans the College of Engineering, College of Pharmacy, and Shivalik Institute of Professional Studies with affiliations to UTU, SDSUU, and UBTER.

cards.title: Student Promise
cards.body: Experiential learning, mentoring pods, and flexible curricula enable every learner to explore interests, pursue dream careers, and graduate as socially conscious leaders.

highlights: Recognized by AICTE, PCI, and MoE
